about_the_game:
Mystic Warfare is an auto-battle game where players must build and develop their army of minions to become stronger while adjusting their tactics to conquer enemies across various battlefields. Discover a variety of elemental minions with unique abilities, upgrade them, and craft items to gain an advantage. Every decision and strategy is key to victory!

Find your powerful minions in various elements.

Discover the strongest minions from different elements, such as Fire, Water, Wind, and Earth. Each element grants unique abilities that can give you an advantage in battle. Choose the minions that best fit your strategy and lead your team to victory.

Level up to expand the maximum capacity of your minions.

Increase your level to raise the limit of minions you can deploy in battle. The higher your level, the larger and more powerful your team becomes.

Choose and build blessings for your minions.

Select and create the right blessings to enhance your minions' special abilities, such as increasing attack power, resisting debuffs, or restoring health. Blessings play a key role in gaining an advantage on the battlefield.

Combine Items for Greater Power.

Merge two items, whether of the same type or different kinds, to create a more powerful new item. This crafting system allows you to gain a significant advantage on the battlefield while customizing equipment to perfectly fit your strategy.

Deposit Stars—Double at Camp!

Collect "Stars," a key resource in the game. Deposit them while traveling, and once you reach camp, you can withdraw twice the amount, giving you more resources to enhance your gameplay.

Plan Your Strategy for Combat.

Develop a combat strategy that suits your playstyle, from selecting the right minions and positioning them on the battlefield to anticipating enemy movements. A well-thought-out plan is key to securing victory in every battle.
